00005 from urllib2 import Request, urlopen
00006 import base64
00007 
00008 from tweepy import oauth
00009 from tweepy.error import TweepError
00010 from tweepy.api import API
00011 
00012 
00013 class AuthHandler(object):
00014 
00015     def apply_auth(self, url, method, headers, parameters):
00016         """Apply authentication headers to request"""
00017         raise NotImplementedError
00018 
00019     def get_username(self):
00020         """Return the username of the authenticated user"""
00021         raise NotImplementedError
00022 
00023 
00024 class BasicAuthHandler(AuthHandler):
00025 
00026     def __init__(self, username, password):
00027         self.username = username
00028         self._b64up = base64.b64encode('%s:%s' % (username, password))
00029 
00030     def apply_auth(self, url, method, headers, parameters):
00031         headers['Authorization'] = 'Basic %s' % self._b64up
00032 
00033     def get_username(self):
00034         return self.username
00035 
00036 
00037 class OAuthHandler(AuthHandler):
00038     """OAuth authentication handler"""
00039 
00040     OAUTH_HOST = 'api.twitter.com'
00041     OAUTH_ROOT = '/oauth/'
00042 
00043     def __init__(self, consumer_key, consumer_secret, callback=None, secure=False):
00044         self._consumer = oauth.OAuthConsumer(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
00045         self._sigmethod = oauth.OAuthSignatureMethod_HMAC_SHA1()
00046         self.request_token = None
00047         self.access_token = None
00048         self.callback = callback
00049         self.username = None
00050         self.secure = secure
00051 
00052     def _get_oauth_url(self, endpoint, secure=False):
00053         if self.secure or secure:
00054             prefix = 'https://'
00055         else:
00056             prefix = 'http://'
00057 
00058         return prefix + self.OAUTH_HOST + self.OAUTH_ROOT + endpoint
00059 
00060     def apply_auth(self, url, method, headers, parameters):
00061         request = oauth.OAuthRequest.from_consumer_and_token(
00062             self._consumer, http_url=url, http_method=method,
00063             token=self.access_token, parameters=parameters
00064         )
00065         request.sign_request(self._sigmethod, self._consumer, self.access_token)
00066         headers.update(request.to_header())
00067 
00068     def _get_request_token(self):
00069         try:
00070             url = self._get_oauth_url('request_token')
00071             request = oauth.OAuthRequest.from_consumer_and_token(
00072                 self._consumer, http_url=url, callback=self.callback
00073             )
00074             request.sign_request(self._sigmethod, self._consumer, None)
00075             resp = urlopen(Request(url, headers=request.to_header()))
00076             return oauth.OAuthToken.from_string(resp.read())
00077         except Exception, e:
00078             raise TweepError(e)
00079 
00080     def set_request_token(self, key, secret):
00081         self.request_token = oauth.OAuthToken(key, secret)
00082 
00083     def set_access_token(self, key, secret):
00084         self.access_token = oauth.OAuthToken(key, secret)
00085 
00086     def get_authorization_url(self, signin_with_twitter=False):
00087         """Get the authorization URL to redirect the user"""
00088         try:
00089             # get the request token
00090             self.request_token = self._get_request_token()
00091 
00092             # build auth request and return as url
00093             if signin_with_twitter:
00094                 url = self._get_oauth_url('authenticate')
00095             else:
00096                 url = self._get_oauth_url('authorize')
00097             request = oauth.OAuthRequest.from_token_and_callback(
00098                 token=self.request_token, http_url=url
00099             )
00100 
00101             return request.to_url()
00102         except Exception, e:
00103             raise TweepError(e)
00104 
00105     def get_access_token(self, verifier=None):
00106         """
00107         After user has authorized the request token, get access token
00108         with user supplied verifier.
00109         """
00110         try:
00111             url = self._get_oauth_url('access_token')
00112 
00113             # build request
00114             request = oauth.OAuthRequest.from_consumer_and_token(
00115                 self._consumer,
00116                 token=self.request_token, http_url=url,
00117                 verifier=str(verifier)
00118             )
00119             request.sign_request(self._sigmethod, self._consumer, self.request_token)
00120 
00121             # send request
00122             resp = urlopen(Request(url, headers=request.to_header()))
00123             self.access_token = oauth.OAuthToken.from_string(resp.read())
00124             return self.access_token
00125         except Exception, e:
00126             raise TweepError(e)
00127 
00128     def get_xauth_access_token(self, username, password):
00129         """
00130         Get an access token from an username and password combination.
00131         In order to get this working you need to create an app at
00132         http://twitter.com/apps, after that send a mail to api@twitter.com
00133         and request activation of xAuth for it.
00134         """
00135         try:
00136             url = self._get_oauth_url('access_token', secure=True) # must use HTTPS
00137             request = oauth.OAuthRequest.from_consumer_and_token(
00138                 oauth_consumer=self._consumer,
00139                 http_method='POST', http_url=url,
00140                 parameters = {
00141                             'x_auth_mode': 'client_auth',
00142                             'x_auth_username': username,
00143                             'x_auth_password': password
00144                 }
00145             )
00146             request.sign_request(self._sigmethod, self._consumer, None)
00147 
00148             resp = urlopen(Request(url, data=request.to_postdata()))
00149             self.access_token = oauth.OAuthToken.from_string(resp.read())
00150             return self.access_token
00151         except Exception, e:
00152             raise TweepError(e)
00153 
00154     def get_username(self):
00155         if self.username is None:
00156             api = API(self)
00157             user = api.verify_credentials()
00158             if user:
00159                 self.username = user.screen_name
00160             else:
00161                 raise TweepError("Unable to get username, invalid oauth token!")
00162         return self.username
